Name: Collect SIGINT
Effect: Gain 1 Blue Intel.

Name: Collect HUMINT
Effect: Gain 1 Red Intel.

Name: Collect IMINT
Effect: Gain 1 Yellow Intel.

Name: Budget Request
Effect: Gain 1 Funding.

Name: Insights
Effect: Gain 1 Operational Progress.

Name: Reappraise
Effect: Convert 1 Intel on a face-down Backup Plan to another type.

Name: Espionage
Effect: Gain 1 Intel.

Name: Diversion
Effect: Force an opponent to lose 1 Operational Progress.

Name: Compile
Effect: Place future Mission Rewards on this card instead of on face-down cards. At the end of the Operation, gain +1 Mission Reward from the supply for every 2 Mission Rewards on this card.
Notes: Scaling resource aggregation, rewards consistency in winning.

Name: Redundancy
Effect: Double 1 Mission Reward on the card to the left.

Name: Turnover
Effect: Destroy a Backup Plan (including this one) to gain 3 Funding.
Notes: Trades tableau space for immediate benefit.

Name: Unexpected Twist
Effect: Activate a Twist effect.

Name: Sell Secrets
Effect: Lose 1 Intel to gain 1 Funding.
You have +2 Blue Intel for recruiting Local Assets.
You have +2 Red Intel for recruiting Local Assets.
You have +2 Yellow Intel for recruiting Local Assets.
You have +1 Intel for recruiting Local Assets.

Name: Serendipity
Effect: Gain 1 random Mission Reward from the bag.

Name: Bet On The Come
Effect: At the end of the Operation, activate all Backup Plans to the right of this card.
Notes: Requires a gamble on future turns.

Name: Reappraise
Effect: At the end of the Operation, activate all Backup Plans to the left of this card.

Name: Shadow
Effect: Copy 1 Mission Reward gained by any player with Priority this turn.

Name: Jackpot
Effect: Double Mission Rewards of a single type on a face-down Backup Plan.

Name: Breakthrough
Effect: Convert all Intel of 1 type on a face-down Backup Plan to another type.

Name: Success Breeds Success
Effect: Duplicate 1 Mission Reward on any face-down Backup Plan.

Name: Sweeten the Deal
Effect: Duplicate 1 Mission Reward on a face-down Backup Plan to the left.

Name: Make Your Own Luck
Effect: Duplicate 1 Mission Reward on a face-down Backup Plan to the right.

Name: Collaboration
Effect: At the end of the Operation, sum the levels of your face-up Backup Plans. Gain 1 Mission Reward for every 3 levels (round up).

Name: Hardball
Effect: Force each player with Priority at any Location this turn to lose 1 Operation Progress.

Name: Double Agents
Effect: Gain 1 Operational Progress for each player with Priority at a Location this turn.

Name: Pull Up Stakes
Effect: At the end of the Operation, gain 1 Operational Progress per face-up Backup Plan.

Name: Mandatory Overtime
Effect: At the end of the Operation, gain 1 Operational Progress per face-down Backup Plan.

Name: Decode
Effect: Lose 1 Intel to gain 2 Intel of a different type.

Name: Extended Network
Effect: Take 1 Mission Reward from a Location you did not visit during this Mission. Replace from the bag.

Name: Red Herring
Effect: Replace 1 Mission Reward on a Location with one of your choice from the supply.
Notes: Why?

Name: Rumors
Effect: Draw 2 random Mission Rewards from the bag and keep 1.

Name: Slush Fund
Effect: Gain 1 Funding. You may lose 2 Funding to gain 1 Intel.

Name: Out On A Limb
Effect: Move the token up on the track, or gain the current reward listed on the space with the token and reset the track.
Notes: Push your luck. Track printed on the card. Needs extra spots on card in case another card allows moving higher than normal.

Name: Insurance
Effect: Start the next Operation with a face-up Backup Plan.
Notes: Opportunity cost this round but big payoff next round. May need to be balanced with a cost.

Name: Coup de Grace
Effect: At the end of the Operation, activate all other face-up Backup Plans.
Notes: Combo Finisher. Activates the entire tableau for a massive end-of-round effect.

Name: Plan A
Effect: Copy the Backup Plan to the left of this card.
Notes: Combo Duplicator. Duplicates an adjacent effect for double value in one turn.

Name: Leverage
Effect: For each of your face-down Backup Plans, take 1 Mission Reward from any Location.
Notes: Scaling Reward. Scales exponentially with successful priority wins, turning losses into huge resource gains. Best to play in the middle when there are 2 face-down BPs to the left and at least one more opportunity to trigger on the right.

Name: Apply Pressure
Effect: For each of your face-down Backup Plans, take 1 random Mission Reward from the bag.
Notes: Scaling Reward. Scales exponentially with successful priority wins.

Name: Unmask Plot
Effect: For each of your face-down Backup Plans, take 1 Mission Reward from the supply.
Notes: Scaling Reward. Scales exponentially with successful priority wins.

Name: Fight Another Day
Effect: You may flip this card face down to flip a face-down Backup Plan card face up and activate it.
Notes: Tension Breaker. Converts a card played from a win (face-down) into a face-up activation, gaining both reward and effect.

Name: Double Down
Effect: Copy the effect of the rightmost Backup Plan card.
Notes: Combo Duplicator. (This loses one resource due to opportunity cost of playing—worth it?)

Name: Subterfuge
Effect: The next time you have Priority at a Location, also play a face-up Backup Plan, activate it, and then flip this card face down. Do not activate other face-up Backup Plans.
Notes: Tension Breaker. Get a reward and play a face-up card in a single action (one-time).

Name: At The Ready
Effect: The next time you lose Priority at a Location, play an extra face-up Backup Plan then flip this card face down.
Notes: Engine Starter. Allows for double tableau growth on a loss (one-time).

Name: Pull Out
Effect: The next time you have Priority at a Location, take 1 fewer Mission Rewards to trigger face-up Backup Plans as if you had lost Priority.
Notes: Tension Breaker. Get a reduced reward (1 reward) and also activate all your face-up cards. This is powerful. Should it only activate one BP?

Name: Snipe
Effect: When you have Priority, take 1 extra Mission Reward from your Location. Replace from the bag.
Notes: Persistent Engine. Provides a continuous, scalable bonus to wins.

Name: Decrypt
Effect: Intel rewards you gain can be of any type (exchange from the supply).
Notes: Rule Changer. Permanent rule modification that guarantees optimal Intel sets, making the primary scoring condition significantly easier. Incentivizes going later in initiative to allow playing this card early.

Name: Gunning For Promotion
Effect: Place a token on this card. At the end of the Operation, convert all tokens here to a single type of Mission Reward of your choice.
Notes: Scaling Engine. Accumulates a resource every time a face-up effect is played, paying out a bulk, customizable reward later.

Name: Support Team
Effect: Place a token on a face-up Backup Plan card without a token. When a card with a token is activated, remove the token to activate it again.
Notes: Combo Multiplier. Allows a key face-up effect to be activated twice.

Name: Preempt
Effect: Swap 1 Mission Reward of your choice with a Mission Reward from the player to your right.
Notes: High Interaction. Can steal the exact resource an opponent needs to complete an Intel Report.

Name: Outmaneuver
Effect: Swap 1 Mission Reward of your choice with a Mission Reward from the player to your left.
Notes: High Interaction. Can steal the exact resource an opponent needs to complete an Intel Report.

Name: Chicken Feed
Effect: Give 1 Mission Reward to another player to activate a face-up Backup Plan, or gain 1 Operational Progress or 2 Funding.
Notes: Social/costly interaction effect.

Name: New Orders
Effect: When you have Priority at a Location you may instead decide to lose Priority.
Notes: Tactical choice to intentionally lose and trigger face-up effects instead of claiming a prize.

Effect: Move card left when triggered?
Double 1 Mission Reward on the card to the right.
Copy the Backup Plan to the right of this card.
Notes: Combo Duplicator. Duplicates an adjacent effect for double value in one turn.

Effect: Move 1 Reward on each card left in your tableau. When N of the same kind are on the same card, do X.
Notes: (why?) Combo Engine. Complex reward management that leads to a huge, scalable bonus (X).

Effect: Block a player from swapping your Mission Rewards.
Notes: Feels too situational and underpowered. It also nerfs the other player’s card. Maybe these need to be one-time/reactive? Opportunity cost here feels very high. Maybe play from hand as an interrupt on top of a face-down card?

Effect: Duplicate 1 Mission Reward on the first face-down Backup Plan to the left.
Duplicate 1 Mission Reward on the first face-down Backup Plan to the right.

Name: Disguise
Effect: You may copy the Priority of the player to your right and then turn this card face down. Ties are resolved in turn order.
Notes: i.e. next highest priority (or lowest, if have initiative). Win Breaker. Grants a guaranteed win/reward and a face-down play, circumventing the normal priority rules.
